text:
Release date
May 2024
Question asked
Are ESRS 2 Appendix B datapoints (other EU legislation) applicable for all undertakings or for
financial institutions only?
ESRS reference
ESRS 2 Appendix B; ESRS 1 chapter 10.2, paragraphs 35 and 133
Key terms
ESRS 2 Appendix B (other EU legislation); EU data-points
Background
The question initially received by EFRAG from the submitter was referring to ESRS 1 chapter 10.2
